original_text: His winnowing fork is in his hand, and he will clear his threshing floor and gather his wheat into the barn, but the chaff he will burn with unquenchable fire.”
korean_text: 손에 키를 들고 자기의 타작 마당을 정하게 하사 알곡은 모아 곳간에 들이고 쭉정이는 꺼지지 않는 불에 태우시리라

sentences.original_text: His winnowing fork is in his hand
and he will clear his threshing floor
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 타작 마당을 깨끗이 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and gather his wheat into the barn
but the chaff he will burn
